summary: TRUCK HAS RE-OCCURRING FREQUENT EPISODES OF CENTER CONTROL PANEL DOES NOT FUNCTION  - WHEN THIS OCCURS- RADIO DOES NOT WORK - NO HEATER -WINDOW DEFROSTER  OR A.C /  WINDOWS CAN NOT BE ROLLED UP OR DOWN - AIR BAG INDICATOR IS NOT WORKING - SO DON'T KNOW IF THE AIR BAGS WOULD DEPLOYED  IF AN ACCIDENT SHOULD OCCUR .THE TRUCK HAS BEEN TO 1 DEALER WHICH SAID IT WAS A SOFT WEAR ISSUE AND CLAIMED TO FIX IT .. LASTED LESS THAN 50 MILES AND BACK TO SQUARE ONE ,, SITTING AT THE SECOND DEALER WHICH STATES IT NOT DOING IT NOW ,, SO COME AND PICK IT UP , THEY RAN A DIAGNOSTICS AND NO DEFAULT CODES WERE FOUND . THIS IS NOT RESOLVING THE ISSUE . IF YOU CANT TELL ME WHAT YOU DID TO FIX IT ..THE ISSUE REMAINS UNRESOLVED ..  A SAFETY ISSUE FOR ALL OCCUPANTS IN THE CAB OF THE TRUCK   .. IF THE AIR BAGS FAIL TO DEPLOY BECAUSE OF THE ISSUE STATED IN THIS COMPLAINT IS NOT ADDRESSED BY THE FORD MOTOR COMPANY.. I HAVE BEEN IN CONTACT WITH THE FORD RELATIONSHIP -  PERSONNEL - AND NOW AWAITING FOR A CALL FROM THE REGIONAL OFFICER ...THE TRUCK IS STILL UNDER FACTORY WARRANTY AND FORD IS REQUIRED TO FULFILL THERE OBLIGATION TO THE CONSUMER AND FIX DEFAULT PRODUCT..
